Package dog.giraffe.image.transform

Class NormalizedHyperHue

  • java.lang.Object
    • dog.giraffe.image.Image.Abstract
      • dog.giraffe.image.Image.Transform
        • dog.giraffe.image.transform.NormalizedHyperHue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Image, Log
    public class NormalizedHyperHue
extends Image.Transform
    NormalizedHyperHue transforms an image as HyperHue does and than normalizes all the vectors to have a uniform length. Points whose lengths are smaller than the specified maxZero are collapsed to the zero point.
